alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 01 at 2:13AM MST until January 02 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 PM MST SUNDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Blowing snow expected. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Central Laramie County to include Cheyenne. * WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to 11 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
